name: Prisma Inc
description:
Instructions

Left and Right Arrows : Steer your craft (whilst the Rudder is still attached)

1 : Toggle inside thrusters on and off (whilst they are still attached, can give some steering after the Rudder is off)

2 : Toggle outside thrusters on and off

Weapons fire automatically.

Destroyed buildings give your more fuel

Game Over happens when your control module is destroyed, or you run out of fuel.

Your craft is fragile, every component is a one hit. Avoid everything.

The rudder is set by you and will continue to steer your craft unless it is re centred. If your craft is listing due to imbalanced thrusters you can compensate with the rudder. If your Rudder gets knocked off your time is limited - death is coming.

--------------------

This game is lacking most of the features intended for it. I will implement them slowly. Rough is the word, please be forgiving.
